document_title: Sore eyes: Causes, symptoms and common diseases
subsection_content:
Eye pain occurs when the eye area feels sore, uncomfortable, or throbbing in one or both eyes. Pain in many locations near the eye, inside the eye or behind the eye [1]... The above phenomena are called eye pain. Some people have eye pain when exposed to strong light or looking at a computer screen for a long time. Eye pain is a symptom of a number of diseases that need to be checked and treated early.
Have your eyes examined regularly if your eyes show signs of abnormalities.
